name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Protein Bites
author: alica
summary: All the goodness of chocolate chip cookies plus protein, fiber, and vitamins. Even my picky kids love them. I keep them in the freezer and pop a couple into lunches for a nutritious treat.
ingredients: ⅔ cup soy protein powder (such as MLO®)
2 tablespoons milk, or more as needed
directions: Combine all-purpose flour, soy protein powder, and oat flour together in a bowl
Beat white sugar, brown sugar, yogurt, and butter together in a large bowl with an electric mixer until smooth and creamy
Mix in milk, 1 tablespoon at a time, until batter is thick and smooth
Roll batter into 1-inch balls with your hands
Transfer to the freezer and chill until firm, about 1 hour, or in the refrigerator, 2 to 3 hours
